mapper.select: select agent.id, agent.agent_type, agent.agent_name, agent.login_name, agent.contact_user, agent.contact_phone, agent.account_status, agent.registered_type, agent.bind_time, agent.parent_id, parentAgent.agent_name as parentAgentName, recorder.add_user, recorder.add_time, recorder.check_time, recorder.check_user, agentLevel.name as agentLevelName,agentLevel.rebate_type as rebate_type, agent.contact_email, agent.agent_identity_id, agent.agent_register_address, agent.certify_image_urls from agent_account_info agent left join agent_account_info parentAgent on agent.parent_id=parentAgent.id left join agent_account_checking_recorder recorder on agent.id=recorder.id left join agent_level agentLevel on agent.agent_level=agentLevel.id where agent.id=#{agentId}

select agent.id, agent.agent_type, agent.agent_name, agent.login_name, agent.contact_user, agent.contact_phone, agent.account_status, agent.registered_type, agent.bind_time, agent.parent_id, parentAgent.agent_name as parentAgentName, recorder.add_user, recorder.add_time, recorder.check_time, recorder.check_user, agentLevel.name as agentLevelName from agent_account_info agent left join agent_account_info parentAgent on agent.parent_id=parentAgent.id left join agent_account_checking_recorder recorder on agent.id=recorder.id left join agent_level agentLevel on agent.agent_level=agentLevel.id
and agent.agent_name like concat('%',#{agentName},'%')
and agent.contact_user like concat('%',#{contactUser},'%')
and agent.contact_phone like concat('%',#{contactPhone},'%')
order by agent.id desc
limit #{pageBean.offset},#{pageBean.pageSize}
